commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community by %%QkeleQ10%%. It's open source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%github%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions in [this message]%%translate%%.

You can execute `+help <name of command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Below you can find a list of all the available pages. Use the reactions on this message to cycle through them.
madeBy: Bot made with lots of care by %%QkeleQ10%%
timeOut: This menu has timed out. If you wish to use it again, do `+help`.
noDesc:
This command is either in development or only available to staff.
Please contact a staff member if you believe this is an error.

help.description: Σου δείχνει όλες τις διαθέσιμες εντολές και άλλες πληροφορίες σχετικά με το bot.

prefix.description: Σου δίνει το κατάλληλο πρόθεμα για την γλώσσα/γλώσσες σου.

quote.description: Παίρνει (ή προσθέτει) ένα αστείο/περίεργο/σοφό παράθεμα από τον διακομιστή.

mention.description: Αναφέρει έναν ρόλο γλώσσας με ένα προαιρετικό μήνυμα.

context.description: Παίρνει, προσθέτει ή επεξεργάζεται την περιγραφή για το string ID που δόθηκε. Το `+context help` σου δείχνει πληροφορίες σχετικά με αυτή την εντολή.

issue.description: Opens our GitHub issues page, where you can report problems and send feedback.

language.description: Αλλάζει την γλώσσα σου, δείχνει την τωρινή σου ή δείχνει μία λίστα με τις διαθέσιμες γλώσσες.

ping.description: Gives you the bot's ping as well as Discord API's ping.

invite.description: Gives you an invite link to the server. Please use this whenever you want to invite someone.

guidelines.description: Gives you the link to the official thread regarding Hypixel translations.

hypixel.description: Gives you useful information regarding the Hypixel project.

quickplay.description: Gives you useful information regarding the Quickplay project.

skyblockaddons.description: Gives you useful information regarding the SkyblockAddons project.

thread.description: Gives you the link to the thread announcing this Discord server.

twitter.description: Gives you the link to the official Hypixel Translators Community Twitter page.

tip.description: Gives you a random tip regarding the server.
